get.summary: Returns information about the server such as supported client version.
Returns a test string message and the URL of the Game Server.

info.title: Cultris 3
info.description: REST API provided by the C3 Main Server.

version.description: The version number of the server. For example, server version 0.1 will only support client versions 0.1.x.

clientDownloadUrl.description: URL to download the latest (or compatible) client to play on the current server version.

gameServerUrl.description: This is where the client can connect to the game server via websocket.
